body:
I'm still have issues with the patch:

```
$ ./tools/distrib/clang_format_code.sh
++ dirname ./tools/distrib/clang_format_code.sh
+ cd ./tools/distrib/../..

The subsequent runs of this command give me a similar package authentication error. Maybe I need to clear my cache somehow...

```
$ ./tools/distrib/clang_format_code.sh
++ dirname ./tools/distrib/clang_format_code.sh

@jboeuf   this has broken the sanity test (because the code formatting is incorrect).

https://grpc-testing.appspot.com/job/gRPC_pull_requests/8586/config=opt,language=sanity,platform=linux/testReport/junit/(root)/tests/tools_distrib_clang_format_code_sh/

Btw, we are in managed merge mode, next time please add "ready to merge" label and @nicolasnoble  or me will merge.

Fix is here: 
https://github.com/grpc/grpc/pull/6534

Sorry about that. Will keep in mind for next time...

On Wed, May 11, 2016 at 10:26 AM, Jan Tattermusch notifications@github.com
wrote:
